articles.author: Lorenzo Franceschi-Bicchierai
articles.title: Apple fixes zero-day flaw affecting all devices - TechCrunch
articles.description: The zero-day bug was fixed in iPhones, iPads, Macs, Apple TVs, Apple Watches and Vision Pro headsets.
articles.content:
Apple released the latest updates for its iPhone, iPad and Mac operating systems on Monday, which included switching on Apple Intelligence by default for newer devices. 
As part of this batch of sof… [+1104 chars]
